channel.title: Help with Loyalty titles
channel.description:
Hello everyone. I am having some problems with loyalty titles, now the problem is that when I added them I though everything was ok. Now recently I have found out when someone talks there name shows up like this.
@or2@@whi@(NAME HERE)
The thing is though, only other people see this. When you talk you do not see this in your own chat box. However when others talk you can see there name like this.
An example is this, it is the problem I am having.
[IMG]http://i1268.photobucket.com/albums/jj579/reverse_hate/Error.png?t=1327770878[/img]

item.title: Help with Loyalty titles
item.dc:creator: @Reverse_Hate Reverse Hate
item.description:
@Reverse_Hate wrote:

Ayee Mah Picture! :DDD Anyways, I have the same issue, I would like to get this resolved as I plan to fix the few problems I have left on my PI 317 and the release to mopar. Because I will never host it, And I added it client sided and source sided.

Read full topic
